sub_title: Programme Management and Coordination | Experienced in Planning, Execution, Monitoring and Control| Worked on Rural Development ,Gender Equality ,Good Governance & CSO Capacity Building Projects
summary:
I am a meticulous Project Manager with a proven track record of delivering multimillion Euros development projects for international organizations,  on time and on budget. Colleagues and stakeholders appreciate my effective coordination skills, my experience with donor compliance, and my dedication to quality program delivery.

Afghan citizen with Dutch work permit
